label: cascading_failure_01_dx_dns_migration_023
content:

- signer-01: CPU 28% | Mem 71% | Disk 65% | Conns: N/A | Net: 14/19 Mbps

### Connection Pools
- pool-axfr: active 37 | idle 0 | waiting 0 | exhaustion 0 | max 50 | avg_wait 0ms
- pool-ixfr: active 204 | idle 0 | waiting 0 | exhaustion 0 | max 250 | avg_wait 0ms
- pool-propagation: active 36 | idle 0 | waiting 0 | exhaustion 0 | max 50 | avg_wait 0ms

- pool-ttl: active 8 | idle 0 | waiting 0 | exhaustion 0 | max 20 | avg_wait 0ms
- pool-change-mgmt: active 6 | idle 0 | waiting 0 | exhaustion 0 | max 10 | avg_wait 0ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 89.5% | Bandwidth: 2.4 Gbps | Origin requests: 24400

### Alerts
- [INFO] DNSSEC validation sweep completed on hostname: signer-01
- [INFO] TTL changes applied to 8 zones; 57 records changed
- [INFO] Propagation to 36 cloud edge sites completed; avg: 59s, p95: 138s
- [INFO] Zone transfer: 37 AXFR requests; 100% success; 204 IXFR requests; 99.7% success; avg transfer time: 500ms; p95: 1155ms
- [INFO] DNS queries peaked at 61800 QPS; average 24400 QPS; 2.1% NXDOMAIN; 0.04% SERVFAIL; 97.2% UDP; 1.1% TCP fallback
- [INFO] Change requests: 6; all applied successfully; mean apply time: 15 min

### Deployments & Changes
- Migrated 16 zones; acquisition cleanup changes merged and applied cleanly through pipeline
- Enabled prefetch for small set of POPs (84%); measured lower query bursts after TTL changes
- Ran external DNSSEC validation sweep for all signed zones; no bogus events observed; proof outputs recorded in ticket
- Updated documentation for dynamic update ACL review cadence and approval flow

### Events
- Migrated 16 zones; acquisition cleanup changes merged and applied cleanly through pipeline
- Enabled prefetch for small set of POPs (84%); measured lower query bursts after TTL changes
- Ran external DNSSEC validation sweep for all signed zones; no bogus events observed; proof outputs in ticket

### On-Call
- shift handoff note: A. Morales. 0 pages. 4 tickets. Status: Normal; smooth migration batch and DNSSEC sweep completed.
